attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty and make the justice system harsher
attributes.additional_details: The justice system isn't powerful enough and if you take a life why should you keep yours. If they were convicted for a long time they wouldn't re-offend.
attributes.background: Bring back the death penalty for terrorists, rapists, murderers or any egregious crimes and make the justice system harsher e.g rapists get minimum 15 years.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Reintroduce the death penalty for people found guilty of terrorism
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710686

Bring back capital punishment for the rape of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711979
